member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter
member.summary: Set of available configuration options for XIMEA cameras.

remarks.para: The class defines list of parameters, which are available to set/get using corresponding methods of and classes.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.DeviceName
member.summary: Get camera model name. Type string.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.DeviceSerialNumber
member.summary: Get device serial number in decimal format. Type string, integer, float

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.DeviceType
member.summary: Returns device type (1394, USB2.0, CURRERAâ€¦..). Type string.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Exposure
member.summary: Set/Get exposure time in microseconds. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.ExposureMax
member.summary: Get longest possible exposure to be set on camera in microseconds. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.ExposureMin
member.summary: Get shortest possible exposure to be set on camera in microseconds. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Gain
member.summary: Set/Get camera gain in dB. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GainMax
member.summary: Get highest possible camera gain in dB. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GainMin
member.summary: Get lowest possible camera gain in dB. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Width
member.summary: Set/Get width of the image provided by the camera (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.WidthMax
member.summary: Get maximal image width provided by the camera (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.WidthMin
member.summary: Get minimum image width provided by the camera (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Height
member.summary: Set/Get height of the image provided by the camera (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.HeightMax
member.summary: Get maximal image height provided by the camera (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.HeightMin
member.summary: Get minimum image height provided by the camera (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Downsampling
member.summary: Set/Get image resolution by binning or skipping. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.DownsamplingMax
member.summary: Get highest value for binning or skipping. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.DownsamplingMin
member.summary: Get lowest value for binning or skipping. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Framerate
member.summary: Get frames per second. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.FramerateMax
member.summary: Get highest possible framerate for current camera settings. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.FramerateMin
member.summary: Get lowest framerate for current camera settings. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.OffsetX
member.summary: Set/Get horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.OffsetXMax
member.summary: Get maximum horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.OffsetXMin
member.summary: Get minimum horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.OffsetY
member.summary: Set/Get vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.OffsetYMax
member.summary: Get maximum vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.OffsetYMin
member.summary: Get minimal vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.WhiteBalanceBlue
member.summary: Set/Get white balance blue coefficient. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.WhiteBalanceRed
member.summary: Set/Get white balance red coefficient. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.WhiteBalanceGreen
member.summary: Set/Get white balance green coefficient. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Sharpness
member.summary: Set/Get sharpness strenght. Type float.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GammaY
member.summary: Set/Get luminosity gamma value. Type float. By default 1.0.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GammaC
member.summary: Set/Get chromaticity gamma value. Type float. By default 0.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.SetDefaultColorCorrectonMatrix
member.summary: Set default color correction matrx.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.ImageFormat
member.summary: Set/Get image format provided by the camera. Type integer. Use enumeraton for possible values.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.Trigger
member.summary: Set/Get camera's trigger mode. Type integer. Use enumeration for possible values.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.SoftwareTrigger
member.summary: Generates an internal trigger. must be set to . Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.CalculateWhiteBalance
member.summary: Calculates white balance. Takes white balance from image center (should be white/grey object in the center of scene). Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AutoWhiteBalance
member.summary: Enable/disable automatic white balance. Type integer. By default 0.

remarks.para: Set 0 to disable automatic white balance or 1 to enable.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.BadPixelsCorrection
member.summary: Enable/disable bad pixels correction. Type integer. By default 0.

remarks.para: Set 0 to disable bad pixels correction or 1 to enable.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AcquisitionBufferSize
member.summary: Set/Get acquisition buffer size in bytes. Type integer. By default 53248000.

remarks.para: Defines acquisition buffer size in bytes. This buffer contains images' data from sensor. This parameter can be set only when acquisition is stopped.
See for additional information.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.BufferQueueSize
member.summary: Set/Get maximum number of images to store in queue. Type integer. By default 4.

remarks.para: See also for additional information.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AEAG
member.summary: Set of configuration options to configure Automatic Exposure/Gain (AEAG) parameters.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AEAG.Enable
member.summary: Enable/disable automatic exposure/gain control. Type integer. By default 0.

remarks.para: Set 0 to disable automatic exposure/gain control or 1 to enable.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AEAG.ExposureMaxLimit
member.summary: Set/Get maximum limit of exposure in AEAG procedure. Type integer. By default 100. Units - ms.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AEAG.GainMaxLimit
member.summary: Set/Get maximum limit of gain in AEAG procedure. Type float. Default depends on camera type. Units - dB.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AEAG.ExposurePriority
member.summary: Set/Get exposure priority, [0, 1]. Type float. By default 0.8.

remarks.para: Setting the value to 0.5, for example, set exposure priority to 50% and gain priority to 50%.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.AEAG.Level
member.summary: Set/Get average intensity of output signal AEAG should achieve (in %). Type float. By default 40.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LED
member.summary: Set of configuration options to configure camera's LEDs. Currently supported only for Currera-R cameras.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LED.Selector
member.summary: Selects camera LED to be used. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LED.Max
member.summary: Get highest LED number on camera. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LED.Min
member.summary: Get lowest LED number on camera. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LED.Mode
member.summary: Set/Get LED functionality. Select LED by using parameter. Use enumeration for possible parameter values. Type integer.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPO
member.summary: Set of configuration options to configure GPO (General Purpose Output) ports.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPO.Selector
member.summary: Select camera GPO port. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPO.Max
member.summary: Get highest GPO port number on camera. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPO.Min
member.summary: Get lowest GPO port number on camera. Type integer

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPO.Mode
member.summary: Set/Get GPO port functionality. Select port by using parameter. Use enumeration to set mode. Type integer.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPI
member.summary: Set of configuration options to access/configure GPI (General Purpose Input) ports.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPI.Selector
member.summary: Select camera GPI port. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPI.Max
member.summary: Get highest GPI port number on camera. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPI.Min
member.summary: Get lowest GPI port number on camera. Type integer

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPI.Mode
member.summary: Set/Get GPI port functionality. Select port by using parameter. Use enumeration to set mode. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.GPI.Level
member.summary: Get current GPI level. Type integer.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT
member.summary: Set of configuration options to configure camera's LUT - Look-Up-Table. Currently available only for Currera-R cameras.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.Enable
member.summary: Enable/Disable LUT. Type integer. Default 0.

remarks.para: Set 0 to disable LUT - sensor pixels are transferred directly. Set 1 to enable LUT - sensor pixels are mapped through LUT.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.Index
member.summary: Set/Get the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.IndexMin
member.summary: Get lowest LUT index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.IndexMax
member.summary: Get highest LUT index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.Value
member.summary: Set/Get value in the LUT. Index of the value must be selected using parameter. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.ValueMin
member.summary: Get highest value to be set in LUT. Type integer.

member.name: F:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.LUT.ValueMax
member.summary: Get lowest value to be set in LUT. Type integer.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.CameraParameter.ColorCorrectionMatrix

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera
member.summary: The class provides access to XIMEA cameras.

remarks.para: The class allows to perform image acquisition from XIMEA cameras. It wraps XIMEA'a xiAPI, which means that users of this class will also require m3api.dll and a correct TM file for the camera model connected to the system (both are provided with XIMEA API software package).
Sample usage:

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.CamerasCount
member.summary: Get number of XIMEA camera connected to the system.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.IsAcquisitionStarted
member.summary: Specifies if camera's data acquisition is currently active for the opened camera (if any).

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.IsDeviceOpen
member.summary: Specifies if a camera is currently opened by the instance of the class.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.DeviceID
member.summary: ID of the the recently opened XIMEA camera.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.Open(System.Int32)
member.summary: Open XIMEA camera.

remarks.para: Opens the specified XIMEA camera preparing it for starting video acquisition which is done using method. The property can be used at any time to find if a camera was opened or not.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.Close
member.summary: Close opened camera (if any) and release allocated resources.

para.note: The method also calls method if it was not done by user.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.StartAcquisition
member.summary: Begin camera's work cycle and start data acquisition from it.

remarks.para: The property can be used at any time to find if the acquisition was started or not.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.StopAcquisition
member.summary: End camera's work cycle and stops data acquisition.
member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.SetParam(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set camera's parameter.

remarks.para: The method allows to control different camera's parameters, like exposure time, gain value, etc. See class for the list of some possible configuration parameters. See XIMEA documentation for the complete list of supported parameters.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.SetParam(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Set camera's parameter.

remarks.para: The method allows to control different camera's parameters, like exposure time, gain value, etc. See class for the list of some possible configuration parameters. See XIMEA documentation for the complete list of supported parameters.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.GetParamInt(System.String)
member.summary: Get camera's parameter as integer value.
member.param: Parameter name to get from camera.
member.returns: Returns integer value of the requested parameter.

remarks.para: See class for the list of some possible configuration parameters. See XIMEA documentation for the complete list of supported parameters.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.GetParamFloat(System.String)
member.summary: Get camera's parameter as float value.
member.param: Parameter name to get from camera.
member.returns: Returns float value of the requested parameter.

remarks.para: See class for the list of some possible configuration parameters. See XIMEA documentation for the complete list of supported parameters.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.GetParamString(System.String)
member.summary: Get camera's parameter as string value.
member.param: Parameter name to get from camera.
member.returns: Returns string value of the requested parameter.

remarks.para: See class for the list of some possible configuration parameters. See XIMEA documentation for the complete list of supported parameters.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.GetImage
member.summary: Get image from the opened XIMEA camera.
member.returns: Returns image retrieved from the camera.

remarks.para: The method calls method specifying 5000 as the timeout value.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.GetImage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get image from the opened XIMEA camera.
member.param: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds till image becomes available.
member.returns: Returns image retrieved from the camera.

remarks.para: The method calls method specifying the makeCopy parameter.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaCamera.GetImage(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get image from the opened XIMEA camera.
member.param: Maximum time to wait in milliseconds till image becomes available.
Make a copy of the camera's image or not.
member.returns: Returns image retrieved from the camera.

remarks.para: If the is set to , then the method creates a managed copy of the camera's image, so the managed image stays valid even when the camera is closed. However, setting this parameter to creates a managed image which is just a wrapper around camera's unmanaged image. So if camera is closed and its resources are freed, the managed image becomes no longer valid and accessing it will generate an exception.

member.exception: An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.
No camera was opened, so can not access its methods.
Time out value reached - no image is available within specified time value.

member.name: T:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource
member.summary: The class provides continues access to XIMEA cameras.

remarks.para: The video source class is aimed to provide continues access to XIMEA camera, when images are continuosly acquired from camera and provided throw the event. It just creates a background thread and gets new images from XIMEA camera keeping the specified time interval between image acquisition. Essentially it is a wrapper class around providing interface.
Sample usage:

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.NewFrame
member.summary: New frame event.

remarks.para: Notifies clients about new available frames from the video source.

para.note: Since video source may have multiple clients, each client is responsible for making a copy (cloning) of the passed video frame, because the video source disposes its own original copy after notifying of clients.

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.VideoSourceError
member.summary: Video source error event.
member.remarks: This event is used to notify clients about any type of errors occurred in video source object, for example internal exceptions.

member.name: E:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.PlayingFinished
member.summary: Video playing finished event.

remarks.para: This event is used to notify clients that the video playing has finished.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.Source
member.summary: A string identifying the video source.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.IsRunning
member.summary: State of the video source.
member.remarks: Current state of video source object - running or not.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.BytesReceived
member.summary: Received bytes count.
member.remarks: Number of bytes the video source provided from the moment of the last access to the property.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.FramesReceived
member.summary: Received frames count.
member.remarks: Number of frames the video source provided from the moment of the last access to the property.

member.name: P:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.FrameInterval
member.summary: Time interval between frames.

remarks.para: The property sets the interval in milliseconds between getting new frames from the camera. If the property is set to 100, then the desired frame rate should be about 10 frames per second.

para.note: Setting this property to 0 leads to no delay between video frames - frames are read as fast as possible.

remarks.para: Default value is set to 200.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: XIMEA camera ID (index) to connect to.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.Start
member.summary: Start video source.
member.remarks: Starts video source and returns execution to caller. Video camera will be started and will provide new video frames through the event.
member.exception: There is no XIMEA camera with specified ID connected to the system.
An error occurred while communicating with a camera. See error message for additional information.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.SignalToStop
member.summary: Signal video source to stop its work.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.WaitForStop
member.summary: Wait for video source has stopped.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.Stop
member.summary: Stop video source.

remarks.para: The method stops the video source, so it no longer provides new video frames and does not consume any resources.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.SetParam(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set camera's parameter.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.SetParam(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Set camera's parameter.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.GetParamInt(System.String)
member.summary: Get camera's parameter as integer value.
member.param: Parameter name to get from camera.
member.returns: Returns integer value of the requested parameter.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.GetParamFloat(System.String)
member.summary: Get camera's parameter as float value.
member.param: Parameter name to get from camera.
member.returns: Returns float value of the requested parameter.

member.name: M:Accord.Video.Ximea.XimeaVideoSource.GetParamString(System.String)
member.summary: Get camera's parameter as string value.
member.param: Parameter name to get from camera.
member.returns: Returns string value of the requested parameter.
